methods.name: InitializeView
methods.description: use this block to initialize tic tac toe view to a AndroidViewComponent

methods.name: ResetGame
methods.description: Use this block to reset the game

name: TicTacToe
helpString:
You can use this extension for creating TicTacToe game. This extension has all the features that are needed for creating TicTacToe.
This extension was created by Horizon.
Thank You

events.name: OnGameDraw
events.description: Event triggered after the game is draw

events.name: OnXTurn
events.description: Event triggered When its X's turn

events.name: OnOTurn
events.description: Event triggered when its O's turn

events.name: OnWinnerFound
events.description: If the winner is X then 0 will be returned and if the winner is O then 1 will be returned
